tool_description:
**UPDATED FOR 2324 SEASON**
An API providing stats around the Premier League football league.
name: Premier League Stats
title: Premier League Stats

api_list.name: FixturesByGameweekClubAndSeason
api_list.description: Get all fixtures from a particular gameweek, club and season.

api_list.name: FixturesByDateTime
api_list.description: Provides fixtures from a date time in the following format '2023-09-16T14:00'

api_list.name: FixturesByGameweekAndSeason
api_list.description: Get all fixtures from a particular gameweek and season.

api_list.name: FixturesById
PlayersByNationality
PlayersByPosition
api_list.description: Get all players by position like "Midfield".

api_list.name: Players By ID
api_list.description: Get a players stats by their ID. Choose from all registered premier league players.

api_list.name: PlayersByClub
api_list.description: Get list of players for a given club.

api_list.name: PlayersByName
api_list.description: Get list of players with given name.
